scripts.dev: npm run docs:prepare && nuxi dev docs
scripts.docs:debug: npm run docs:prepare && nuxi dev docs --inspect
scripts.docs:build: npm run setup && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=7000 nuxi build docs
scripts.docs:prepare: npm run setup && nuxt-module-build --stub && nuxi prepare docs
scripts.docs:generate: npm run setup && nuxt-module-build build --stub && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=7000 nuxi generate docs
scripts.api:debug: npm run api:prepare && nuxi dev api --open --inspect
scripts.api:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare api
scripts.static:debug: npm run static:prepare && nuxi dev static --open --inspect
scripts.static:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare static
scripts.carica: npm run sites:prepare && nuxi dev sites/carica --inspect
scripts.evergel: npm run sites:prepare && nuxi dev sites/evergel --inspect
scripts.ledleith: npm run sites:prepare && nuxi dev sites/ledleith --inspect
scripts.lippli: npm run sites:prepare && nuxi dev sites/lippli --inspect
scripts.simplise: npm run sites:prepare && nuxi dev sites/simplise --inspect
scripts.simplise-dsr: npm run sites:prepare && nuxi dev sites/simplise-dsr --inspect
scripts.release: npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.setup: git config --local core.ignorecase false && npm install
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run docs:generate && npx wrangler pages deploy docs/.output/public --project-name usebootstrap
scripts.deploy:api:cf: npm run api:build && npx wrangler deploy --config api/wrangler.toml
scripts.update: npx nuxi upgrade -f && ncu --interactive && npx nuxi dev --open
